title: Itu Handicraft Fair
description: Exhibition and sale of local handicrafts, live music, and typical foods.

title: Winter Gastronomy Festival
description: Tasting of typical dishes, food trucks, and cultural performances.

title: Itu Night Run
description: Night street race with 5km and 10km courses.

title: Classic Cars Gathering
description: Exhibition of classic cars, music, and food court.

title: Amateur Theater Showcase
description: Theatrical plays by local and regional groups.

title: Sertanejo Music Festival
description: Shows by sertanejo artists and food court.

title: Environment Week
description: Lectures, workshops, and activities for children about sustainability.

title: Food Truck Gathering
description: Variety of food trucks and live music.

title: Itu Dance Festival
description: Performances by dance groups of various styles.

title: Guided Historical Walk
description: Guided tour of the city's main historical sites.

title: Urban Photography Workshop
description: Practical photography workshop through the streets of Itu.

title: Open-Air Cinema Festival
description: Screening of national films outdoors, free popcorn.

title: Motorcyclists Gathering
description: Motorcyclists' meetup, shows, and food trucks.

title: Itu Vegan Fair
description: Vegan products, lectures, and cooking workshops.

title: Independent Rock Festival
description: Independent rock bands and food court.
